message:
Yemen's embattled president has accused the United States and Israel of trying to destabilize his country and the Arab world.

‎"However, on Tuesday, Saleh seemed to be turning on Washington. In a speech to about 500 students & lecturers at Sanaa University, he claimed the U.S., along with Israel, is behind the protest movement."

http://news.yahoo.com/s/ap/20110301/ap_on_re_mi_ea/ml_yemen
